item.title: Scuttlebutt reminds me of BBS days
item.description: 21:29 Monday 22 October 2018 JST This description of scuttlebutt reminds me of BBS days. I think I will dip a toe into this. https://www.scuttlebutt.nz/ 00:13 Tuesday 23 October 2018 JST 3 hours later…. was dragged under by the current and oh man I gotta go to bed!
